title: Subtle Wellness Reiki
author: Subtle Wellness
description: We offer Reiki sessions and classes, ongoing support for Reiki practitioners and teachers, mind body therapy, and aromatherapy.
cleaned_text: Developed in Japan, Reiki is becoming increasingly popular around the world as a stress-reduction technique that uses light touch to create well-being. Research has shown that the natural and non-invasive technique of Reiki can reduce pain, nausea, anxiety, and improve sleep. The lightness felt after a session leaves the client calm and energized. Learn more below. Mind body techniques bring together eclectic embodied practices to promote feelings of peace and well-being. As well as Reiki, sessions might include meditations, movement, breath work, and exploring and transforming parts of ourselves that feel unauthentic. You will usually be seated and relaxed on a couch for these sessions. Discover how the essential components of plants can nourish and transform every aspect of our being. An aromatherapy consultation allows you to explore different blends and applications and discover how essential oils can best assist your well-being. Working with an aromatherapist provides education and an economical way to explore essential oils. Stay up to date with Reiki classes, mind body therapy, free support events, yoga nidra, aromatherapy and more. We use cookies to analyze website traffic and optimize your website experience. By accepting our use of cookies, your data will be aggregated with all other user data.
